summary: Vue File Migration: Duplicate Locations Discovered

message.content:
update .plans\2. TODOs\modularRestructuringTableChecklist.md\
\
Add a column after the "File Moved?" column called "Old File Cleaned up?"

content.text: I'll update the modular restructuring table checklist to add the requested column.
